name: AI Upscaler Plugin
overview: AI-Powered Video Upscaling Plugin with Docker Microservice Architecture
description: Revolutionary AI upscaling plugin with Docker-based AI processing. Supports NVIDIA CUDA/TensorRT, Intel OpenVINO, AMD ROCm, and CPU. Features automated hardware benchmarking, intelligent fallback system, pre-processing cache, and sidebar integration.
changelog: v1.5.2: Intel GPU detection fix (Issue #45), TensorRT fallback fix (Issue #46), full multi-GPU provider chain, website troubleshooting updates.
